Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs

[Groovy] Interface VfsURICollection

  • Similar to a org.gradle.api.file.FileCollection, this manages a collection of URIs.

    Since:
    1.0

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        VfsURICollection add(VfsURI uri)
        Adds a URI to this collection
        boolean allResolved()
        Checks whether all URIs in the collection have been resolved.
        boolean contains(VfsURI uri)
        Checks whether a specific URI is within a collection.
        VfsURICollection filter(groovy.lang.Closure filterClosure)
        Restricts the contents of this collection to those URIs which match the given criteria.
        VfsURICollection filter(Spec<VfsURI> filterSpec)
        Restricts the contents of this collection to those files which match the given criteria.
        java.util.Set<VfsURI> getUris()
        Contents of the collection.
        boolean isEmpty()
        Check whether collection is empty
        VfsURICollection minus(VfsURICollection collection)
        Returns a new collection which is the difference between two collections.
        VfsURICollection plus(VfsURICollection collection)
        Creates a new collection out of two collections
        VfsURICollection resolve()
        Attempt to have all URIs resolved.
        VfsURICollection stopExecutionIfEmpty()
        Throws a StopExecutionException if this collection is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • VfsURICollection add(VfsURI uri)

        Adds a URI to this collection

        Returns:
        This updated collection
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to be added
        Throws:
        Throws UnsupportedOperationException if URIs addition is not supported

      • boolean allResolved()

        Checks whether all URIs in the collection have been resolved.

        Returns:
        True is all are resolved.

      • boolean contains(VfsURI uri)

        Checks whether a specific URI is within a collection. The strings representations are compared to determine whether presence. This allows for both resolved and taged URIs to be compared. ANy vfs query properties will be ignored.

        Returns:
        Return true is the uri is contained within the collection.
        Parameters:
        uri

      • VfsURICollection filter(groovy.lang.Closure filterClosure)

        Restricts the contents of this collection to those URIs which match the given criteria. The filtered collection is live, so that it reflects any changes to this collection. The given closure is passed the VfsURI as a parameter, and should return a boolean value.

        Returns:
        The filtered collection
        Parameters:
        filterClosure - The closure to use to select the contents of the filtered collection

      • VfsURICollection filter(Spec<VfsURI> filterSpec)

        Restricts the contents of this collection to those files which match the given criteria. The filtered collection is live, so that it reflects any changes to this collection.

        Returns:
        The filtered collection.
        Parameters:
        filterSpec - The criteria to use to select the contents of the filtered collection.

      • java.util.Set<VfsURI> getUris()

        Contents of the collection. This will force all items to be resolved.

        Returns:
        Returns the contents of this collection as a Set.

      • boolean isEmpty()

        Check whether collection is empty

        Returns:
        Returns true if this collection is empty.

      • VfsURICollection minus(VfsURICollection collection)

        Returns a new collection which is the difference between two collections.

        Returns:
        Difference between the two collections
        Parameters:
        collection

      • VfsURICollection plus(VfsURICollection collection)

        Creates a new collection out of two collections

        Returns:
        SUm of two collections
        Parameters:
        collection

      • VfsURICollection resolve()

        Attempt to have all URIs resolved. Throws if there is a failure.

        Returns:
        This collection with all URIs resolved
        Throws:
        StopExecutionException if a URI cannot be resolved.

      • VfsURICollection stopExecutionIfEmpty()

        Throws a StopExecutionException if this collection is empty.

        Returns:
        Return this collection if it is not empty
